Dialogs¶

Filters dialog¶

API¶

class mcvgui.dialogs.simple_filter.SimpleFilter(parent=None, video=None)[source]¶

It implements a dialog that allow the user to choose several combinations of filters and apply them to a video. The player allow the user to pre visualize the result.

add_blobs_filters(filtername, pipeline)[source]¶

Add a blob filter

add_image_filters(filtername, pipeline)[source]¶

Add an image filter

blobs_filters¶

Set and retrieve the selected list of blobs filters

clear()[source]¶

Reinit all the fielters

image_filters¶

Set and retrieve the selected list of image filters

processflow(data)[source]¶

Apply the selected workflow of filters.

video_capture¶

Set and retrieve the video for previsualization. The value should be from type cv2.VideoCapture or a path to a video file.
